text: Gotfrid (or Gottfried) Köchert (22 March 1918 – 6 November 1986) was an Austrian who went on to become a yacht racer after World War II, and competed in the 1960 Summer Olympics. He was the biological father of Austrian-American actress Bibi Besch. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:1986 deaths Category:Austrian military personnel of World War II Category:Austrian male sailors (sport) Category:Disease-related deaths in Austria Category:Olympic sailors of Austria Category:Sailors at the 1960 Summer Olympics – 5.5 Metre Category:Sportspeople from Vienna
title: Gotfrid Köchert
